summary: This bill, the Lieutenant Osvaldo Albarati Stopping Prison Contraband Act, aims to increase penalties for providing phones to inmates in correctional facilities. It amends Title 18, Section 1791(b) of the United States Code, specifying a potential prison sentence of up to 2 years for violations. The bill also mandates the Director of the Bureau of Prisons to review and update policies concerning prohibited objects within prisons to improve protections for both inmates and staff, within one year of enactment.
